product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera - Vintage Style, Modern Performance
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled design with durable black metal construction
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system with XF mount compatibility
• Premium mechanical control dials for intuitive operation
• High-performance autofocus system for precise shooting
• Built-in electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Compact and lightweight design ideal for travel photography
• Wi-Fi connectivity for instant photo sharing
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-series lenses
• Multiple creative filters and film simulation modes
• Tiltable LCD screen for flexible shooting angles

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek and modern promotional design for a professional mirrorless camera. The background is a dark, moody collage of deep blue geometric shapes and translucent circles giving a high-tech feel. At the top center, the branding is emphasized using the **heading** text layer in a bold, futuristic font. This is followed by the **subheading** and **description** layers, which add product clarity. The product image (**product_image**) is centrally placed to draw immediate attention. Below it, the **tagline** reinforces the camera's blend of vintage style and modern performance. The **price** layer highlights an irresistible deal using vibrant colors, and the **cta** layer (with background **cta_background**) directs users to action with a bold button.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#1E293B` (Background)
- Slate Blue: `#334155`, `#475569`, `#64748B` (Gradients and overlays)
- Light Grey: `#CBD5E1`, `#E2E8F0`, `#9EA9BB` (Text elements)
- Accent Red: `#FF6B6B` (Price and button)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (Main heading and CTA content)
product_color: The Fujifilm X-T10 camera showcases a sleek, professional aesthetic with a dominant matte black finish (#1A1A1A), complemented by subtle metallic accents. The lens glass reflects hues of soft teal (#A0D5D3), muted yellow (#F2E6B1), and gentle green (#A3C79A), adding an elegant highlight to the otherwise monochrome design. White (#FFFFFF) is used effectively for branding and text, offering strong contrast against the dark surface for readability. Touches of orange (#F28500) and red (#C0392B) on the lens indicate focal lengths and settings, introducing vibrant spots of color that guide the viewer’s eye. Overall, the palette blends sophistication with precision-oriented visuals.
